text: Ultranontanism was a movement within the Roman Catholic Church of the 18th and 19th century. It placed strong emphasis on what the pope had to say. The name in composed of ultra ("beyond"), and refered to the fact that the pope at that time was on the other side of the Alps. ==Other websites== * The Gift of Authority (Eternal Word Television Network) * Category:Christian terminology Category:Christian theology Category:History of Christianity Category:History of Germany Category:History of Vatican City Category:Political ideologies Category:Politics of France Category:Roman Catholicism
title: Ultramontanism
